title: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Noise-canceling over-ear headphones with deep bass and 40-hour battery life.

title: Smartphone Stand
description: Adjustable aluminum phone stand compatible with all smartphones and tablets.

title: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Insulated, leak-proof bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 hours.

title: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: RGB backlit keyboard with tactile switches for a high-performance gaming experience.

title: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Adjustable, high-back chair with lumbar support and breathable mesh design.

title: Smart LED Light Bulbs
description: Color-changing Wi-Fi smart bulbs compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant.

title: Non-Stick Cookware Set

title: Robot Vacuum Cleaner
description: Smart robotic vacuum with automatic scheduling, powerful suction, and app control.
